kama-citra.name: Kama Citra IPA
process: Boiled for 60 minutes with hop additions at 60, 15, 5, and 0 minutes
Dry-hopped with Citra and Cascade for 9 days
kama-citra.description: A flirtatious fusion of American Pale Ale and West Coast IPA, Kama Citra is the session IPA that knows how to keep things interesting. Bold Citra hops take the lead, mingling with the classic Cascade and Centennial for a tropical, citrusy punch that dances across your palate.

halloween-hefe.name: Halloween Hefe
process: Boiled for 60 minutes with hop additions at 60 and 15 minutes
halloween-hefe.description: [Out of Stock] Take a sip and you're transported straight to a Bavarian Bier Hall. This medium-bodied hefe is a tribute to tradition—rich with yeasty, wheat malt character and a smooth finish.
